price: 4. Les Anges et l’Esprit mettent, pour monter vers Lui, un jour qui équivaut à cinquante mille ans.
arabic: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: taʿruju al-malāikatu wal-rūḥu ilayhi fī yawmin kāna miq'dāruhu khamsīna alfa sanatin
